translations: 反抗，阻碍；与……竞争，与……角逐

sentences.sentence: I would oppose changing the law.
sentences.translation: 我将反对改变这个法规。

sentences.sentence: More people favour a single European currency than oppose it.
sentences.translation: 支持欧洲单一货币的人比反对的多。

sentences.sentence: This party would bitterly oppose the re-introduction of the death penalty.
sentences.translation: 本党会强烈反对恢复死刑。
